statements: SELECT * FROM wallet_activity;
SELECT user_id, transaction_date, amount FROM wallet_activity ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, amount FROM wallet_activity WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, description FROM wallet_activity WHERE user_id = '49eae3a3-5e48-4c40-b847-622ec6d36311' AND suspicious = true;
SELECT * FROM wallet_activity WHERE amount < 0;
SELECT * FROM wallet_activity WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, amount, description FROM wallet_activity WHERE description LIKE '%bonus%' AND amount < 0;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, amount FROM wallet_activity WHERE suspicious = true ORDER BY user_id, transaction_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM wallet_activity GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_amount > 500 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM wallet_activity WHERE transaction_id = '82f63c40-0025-49c2-9e96-9c5597d8c78b';
SELECT id, user_id, amount, transaction_type, transaction_date FROM wallet_transactions WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM wallet_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT id, user_id, transaction_type FROM wallet_transactions WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, amount FROM wallet_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Deposit';
SELECT id, transaction_date, amount FROM wallet_transactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT id, user_id, amount, transaction_type, transaction_date FROM wallet_transactions WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT * FROM wallet_transactions WHERE amount > 100 AND transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT id, transaction_type, transaction_date FROM wallet_transactions WHERE amount < 0.00 AND transaction_type = 'refund' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM wallet_transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING SUM(amount) > 1000
SELECT wt.id, wt.user_id, st.reason, st.flagged FROM wallet_transactions wt INNER JOIN suspicious_transactions st ON wt.id = st.transaction_id WHERE st.flagged = TRUE
SELECT * FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE wallet_id = 10;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM wallet ORDER BY balance ASC;
SELECT id, username FROM user WHERE email = 'example@example.com';
SELECT id, transaction_id, amount, wallet_id, timestamp FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, wallet_id FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE wallet_id = 1234 ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT user.username, wallet.balance FROM user JOIN wallet ON user.id = wallet.user_id WHERE user.id = 1001;
SELECT wallet_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM suspicious_transactions GROUP BY wallet_id HAVING total_amount > 5000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;

SELECT user.username, wallet.balance, suspicious_transactions.amount FROM user JOIN wallet ON user.id = wallet.user_id JOIN suspicious_transactions ON wallet.id = suspicious_transactions.wallet_id WHERE user.id = 1002 ORDER BY suspicious_transactions.amount DESC;
SELECT id, username, balance FROM user_accounts;
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs WHERE user_id = 123456;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_time FROM transaction_logs ORDER BY transaction_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, amount, alert_message FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT trigger_name, trigger_conditions FROM transaction_triggers;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts;
SELECT id, username FROM user_accounts WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT user_id, amount, transaction_time FROM transaction_logs WHERE amount < 0 ORDER BY transaction_time DESC;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.user_id, t.amount, s.alert_message FROM transaction_logs t JOIN suspicious_transactions s ON t.transaction_id = s.transaction_id;
SELECT trigger_id, trigger_name, trigger_conditions FROM transaction_triggers WHERE trigger_name LIKE '%balance%';
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, source_account, destination_account FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT account_owner, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance < 0;
SELECT trigger_name, trigger_condition FROM triggers;
SELECT transaction_id, suspect_reason, suspect_level, suspect_date FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE suspect_level >= 3;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 10000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE source_account = '1234' AND destination_account = '5678';
SELECT account_owner, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance < 0 ORDER BY balance ASC;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.transaction_date, s.suspect_reason FROM transactions t INNER JOIN suspicious_transactions s ON t.transaction_id = s.transaction_id WHERE s.suspect_level > 5;
SELECT trigger_name, trigger_condition, trigger_action FROM triggers WHERE trigger_condition LIKE '%fraud%' OR trigger_action LIKE '%block%';
